org.pikater.web.vaadin.gui.shared.kineticcomponent

Interface IKineticComponent

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    KineticComponentClientRpc
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    KineticComponent, KineticComponentWidget

    public interface IKineticComponent
    Interface that both server and client counterparts of KineticComponent must implement. The server counterpart always forwards calls to these methods to the client implementation.
    Author:
    SkyCrawl

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancelBoxHighlight()
      Cancels any highlights made with the highlightBoxes(Integer[]) method.
      void cancelSelection()
      Deselects all selected boxes in the client kinetic canvas.
      void highlightBoxes(java.lang.Integer[] boxIDs)
      Highlights the given boxes in the kinetic canvas according to the visual style specified.
      void resetEnvironment()
      Clears the client kinetic canvas's content and resets inner state.

    • Method Detail

        Cancels any highlights made with the highlightBoxes(Integer[]) method.
